entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:22 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
